News.headline: Black Friday Hospitality Special: Daggers vs. Torquay United
News.page_title: Black Friday Hospitality Special: Daggers vs. Torquay United
News.URL_keywords: Black Friday Hospitality Special: Daggers vs. Torquay United
News.short_description: The Daggers are offering a special on Tuesday night's hosptiality for our evening game against Torquay United
News.description:
In aid of Black Friday the Daggers are offering fans a special to watch the Daggers in style next Tuesday with a special on our hospitality package for our Vanarama National League fixture against Torquay United with prices reduced to just £40.00 per person and £30.00 per person for season ticket holders (usually £65.00).

A massive saving is on offer for any fans wanting to watch the Daggers in style next week. The matchday hospitality package includes the following:

·Three course carvery meal
·Complimentary match day programme and team sheet
·Half time refreshments
·Seat in the sponsors box

The game kicks off at 7:45m with lunch served from 6pm. 

For more information or to make a booking please contact the clubs commercial department on commercial@daggers.co.uk or call 07564622569.

Please note that last orders for this special Black Friday hospitality deal will be will be 7pm on Saturday 26th November. Don't Miss Out!
